#summary examples of Customer Service usage.

== Customer ==

View all Customer:
{{{
import com.google.code.magja.model.customer.Customer;
import com.google.code.magja.service.RemoteServiceFactory;
import com.google.code.magja.service.customer.CustomerRemoteService;
import com.google.code.magja.soap.MagentoSoapClient;
import java.util.List;

public class MagjaCustomerExample {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        try {
            MagentoSoapClient magentoSoapClient = MagentoSoapClient.getInstance();
            CustomerRemoteService customerRemoteService = new RemoteServiceFactory().getCustomerRemoteService();
            customerRemoteService.setSoapClient(magentoSoapClient);

            List<Customer> customers = customerRemoteService.list();
            for (Customer customer : customers) {
                System.out.println(customer.toString());
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.println(e.getMessage());
        }
    }
}
}}}
